title: The greens are shite
quote: Ah, you’re all heading out to play, are you? Well good luck, the greens are shite and there’s water everywhere. The game’s a bogey!

title: Shape yourselves up
quote: Shape yourselves up this year you bunch of bloody lemons!

title: May the odds be ever in your favour
quote: May the odds be ever in your favour. Now, keep your eyes on this one!

title: 2018: Portmore GC
notes: The only evidence I have is the date in my Google calendar... Not a single photo! I also posted a threat on Instagram earlier that summer. Update! Found some photos on Dropbox September 2018 field of 6 Sam Smith in Ali out

title: 2017: Portmore GC
notes: Sam had beaten Tom in Southampton in July and then played with Jim and Jim won

title: 2014: Chulmleigh
notes: Early in the new year, Portmore was closed so we went to Chulmleigh and didn't tell Josh

title: 2012: Portmore GC
notes: 2012, Portmore in knitwear, dad won had his clubs in a camping chair bag, Josh thought he'd beaten Sam by 1 and then we added up Dad's with handicap!

title: The Inaugural Milkshake Cup
notes: 2010, Portmore in school shoes, Emily Langdon took the photos, Josh has an album on Facebook
